RelatedSentence: Credit Suisse has finally managed to settle a longstanding Justice Department probe into help the Swiss bank provided to Americans trying to hide money behind Switzerland 's strict bank secrecy laws .

Credit Suisse has finally managed to settle a longstanding Justice Department probe into help the Swiss bank provided to Americans trying to hide money behind Switzerland 's strict bank secrecy laws .

The $ 2.6 billion agreement is far bigger than what was once anticipated - and more than twice the $ 780 million paid by domestic rival UBS to resolve the same issue - and has stirred some speculation about CEO Brady Dougan 's job security .
Credit Suisse ended up having to make things right with multiple regulators , not just the Justice Department , which opened its probe back in 2011 .
Credit Suisse ended up having to make things right with multiple regulators , not just the Justice Department , which opened its probe back in 2011 .

Credit Suisse has already set aside some $ 800 million for the settlement , and it 's created a sort of bad bank within its private banking business so it can segregate additional related legal costs from the results of its main businesses .
